name: market for operation, computer, desktop, office use | operation, computer, desktop, office use | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/4886/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'operation, computer, desktop, office use', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;The 'operation, computer, desktop, office use' is delivering the service of operation of laptop computer for one hour of use at office. The laptop can have a cathode ray tube (CRT) or a liquid crystal display (LCD) monitor. It is assumed to be active for 3.14 hrs/day, standby for 2.62 hrs/day and off  for 18.24 hrs/day.  

This activity starts with the service generation.


This activity ends with the service supplied to its consumers. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
